segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, like it could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s balancing on his tiptoes, and his plate is wobbling in his hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to fall, and it’s going to be a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing right there, waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re doing this right under the woman’s nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring from the sink, and the floor is getting slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he could really hurt himself, and the woman won’t even know until it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should step in and stop this before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
